TopicTitle: Kerpollo - Apollo Tribute Mission Kerbal-only Movie Version

Articles.Content: Hi! I decided to make a movie production cut of my 7-part Apollo Tribute Mission, reducing 2 and a half hours of video to one hour, using custom kerbal dialogue, and adding music from Kevin MacLeod. The result is the tightest video I've ever made. Enjoy!

My god! You simply done a full-length film using KSP!

Holly Beans! Please forum! Look At this and Spread the word to the world!!

PS: Shut up and take my Rep!!!
